properties.title: Lämmerenhütte SAC
properties.abstract:
Accès 1: Leukerbad - Gemmipass en hiver seulement en Seilbahn
Accès 2: Adelboden-Engstligenalp-Chindbettipass-Rote Totz Lücke-Lämmerental
properties.description: A stately mountain guesthouse high above Gemmipass, on the east side of the Wildstrubel range. It is flanked by high rising rock walls, but nevertheless offers an unobstructed view of Balmhorn/Altels and Bietschhorn. The family-friendly cabin is the starting point for popular hikes towards Leukerbad, Kandersteg and Adelboden. There are various climbing possibilities and high alpine tours in summer and  winter. Often bouquetins can be observed close to the cabin or on the access trail
